text:
Sajid Nawaz Khan (; born 25 March 1975) is a Pakistani politician and a member of the National Assembly of Pakistan since June 2013.
Early life and education.
Khan was born on 25 March 1975 He has a degree of Master of Business Administration.
Political career.
He joined politics after the death of his father Haji Mohammad Nawaz. He ran for the seat of [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Provincial_Assembly_of_Khyber_Pakhtunkhwa Provincial Assembly of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa] as an independent candidate from constituency PF-7 (Peshawar-VII) in [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistani_general_election,_2008 Pakistani general election, 2008] but was unsuccessful. He got 2,038 and lost the seat to a candidate of [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistan_Peoples_Party Pakistan Peoples Party].
He later joined [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistan_Tehreek-e-Insaf Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf] (PTI) and was awarded a PTI ticket to run in 2013 election despite opposition from the PTI Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.<ref name="dawn/2june2013">
He was elected to the National Assembly of Pakistan as a candidate of PTI from Constituency NA-3 NA-3 (Peshawar-III) in Pakistani general election, 2013. He got 66,528 votes.
